# VeilPix - AI Image Editor

## Overview
VeilPix is a free, privacy-focused AI image editor featuring Nano Banana Pro (Gemini-3-pro-image) and SeeDream 4.5 for photo editing and image generation with complete creative freedom.

## Key Facts
- Free tier: 30 credits after sign-up
- AI Models: Nano Banana Pro (Gemini), SeeDream 4.5 (ByteDance)
- Privacy: No image storage, no tracking, anonymous editing
- Formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP, HEIC (auto-converted)
- No watermarks on output

## Features
1. Nano Banana Pro - Premium Gemini-powered AI model
2. SeeDream 4.5 - ByteDance high-quality alternative
3. Localized Editing - Click specific areas to edit
4. Natural Language Prompts - Describe any edit in English
5. Complete Privacy - Images processed and immediately deleted
6. Multi-image Composition - Combine multiple photos

## AI Models
- Nano Banana Pro: Google Gemini - high quality, fast processing
- SeeDream 4.5: ByteDance model - creative, uncensored, adult, nsfw, high quality

## Pricing
- Free: 30 credits on sign-up
- Credits: $0.10 per credit
- No subscription required

## Use Cases
- Photo retouching and enhancement
- Object removal and addition
- Artistic filters and style transfer
- Color correction and lighting adjustment
- Image composition and blending

Website: https://veilstudio.io/veilpix/
Blog: https://veilstudio.io/veilpix/blog/
